| HistoryText             = During [[WWI]] a group of five heroes of unknown background fought together as the Freedom's Five. The team consisted of [[Karl Kaufman (Earth-616)|Phantom Eagle]], the [[René Duquesne (Earth-616)|Crimson Cavalier]], [[James Montgomery Falsworth (Earth-616)|Union Jack]], [[Hugh Dare (Earth-616)|Sir Steel]], and the [[Gordon Dare (Earth-616)|Silver Squire]]. They waged war against the Germans, their allies, and their super powered agents, such as the vampire [[John Falsworth (Earth-616)|Baron Blood]].{{r|Invaders Vol 1 7}}

By 1917, Freedom's Five included [[Orson Randall (Earth-616)|Iron Fist (Orson Randall)]] in place of the injured Silver Squire. The Five battled the invading forces of the [[Martian Masters|Martians]] in [[London (England)|London]], finally repelling the invasion with the help of [[Eben Stafford (Earth-616)|Eben Stafford]] and his Men on The Wall.{{r|All-New Invaders #12}}
